And<S>2532</S> as he<S>846</S> went<S>1607</S> out of<S>1537</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, one<S>1520</S> of his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, see<S>2396</S> what manner<S>4217</S> of stones<S>3037</S> and<S>2532</S> what<S>4217</S> buildings<S>3619</S> are here!
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answering<S>611</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Seest thou<S>991</S> these<S>5025</S> great<S>3173</S> buildings<S>3619</S>? there shall<S>863</S> not<S>3364</S> be left<S>863</S> one stone<S>3037</S> upon<S>1909</S> another<S>3037</S>, that<S>3739</S> shall<S>2647</S> not<S>3364</S> be thrown down<S>2647</S>.
And<S>2532</S> as he<S>846</S> sat<S>2521</S> upon<S>1519</S> the mount<S>3735</S> of Olives<S>1636</S> over against<S>2713</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, Peter<S>4074</S> and<S>2532</S> James<S>2385</S> and<S>2532</S> John<S>2491</S> and<S>2532</S> Andrew<S>406</S> asked<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S> privately<S>2596</S> <S>2398</S>,
Tell<S>2036</S> us<S>2254</S>, when<S>4219</S> shall these things<S>5023</S> be<S>2071</S>? and<S>2532</S> what<S>5101</S> shall be the sign<S>4592</S> when<S>3752</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S> shall<S>3195</S> be fulfilled<S>4931</S>?
And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answering<S>611</S> them<S>846</S> began<S>756</S> to say<S>3004</S>, Take heed<S>991</S> lest<S>3361</S> any<S>5100</S> man deceive<S>4105</S> you<S>5209</S>:
For<S>1063</S> many<S>4183</S> shall come<S>2064</S> in<S>1909</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> Christ; and<S>2532</S> shall deceive<S>4105</S> many<S>4183</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> ye shall hear<S>191</S> of wars<S>4171</S> and<S>2532</S> rumours<S>189</S> of wars<S>4171</S>, be ye<S>2360</S> not<S>3361</S> troubled<S>2360</S>: for<S>1063</S> such things must<S>1163</S> needs be<S>1096</S>; but<S>235</S> the end<S>5056</S> shall not be yet<S>3768</S>.
For<S>1063</S> nation<S>1484</S> shall rise<S>1453</S> against<S>1909</S> nation<S>1484</S>, and<S>2532</S> kingdom<S>932</S> against<S>1909</S> kingdom<S>932</S>: and<S>2532</S> there shall be<S>2071</S> earthquakes<S>4578</S> in divers<S>2596</S> places<S>5117</S>, and<S>2532</S> there shall be<S>2071</S> famines<S>3042</S> and<S>2532</S> troubles<S>5016</S>: these<S>5023</S> are the beginnings<S>746</S> of sorrows<S>5604</S>. <sup>sorrows: the word in the original, importeth; the pains of a woman in travail</sup>
But<S>1161</S> take heed<S>5210</S> <S>991</S> to yourselves<S>1438</S>: for<S>1063</S> they shall deliver<S>3860</S> you<S>5209</S> up<S>3860</S> to<S>1519</S> councils<S>4892</S>; and<S>2532</S> in<S>1519</S> the synagogues<S>4864</S> ye shall be beaten<S>1194</S>: and<S>2532</S> ye shall be brought<S>2476</S> <S>71</S> before<S>1909</S> rulers<S>2232</S> and<S>2532</S> kings<S>935</S> for my<S>1700</S> sake<S>1752</S>, for<S>1519</S> a testimony<S>3142</S> against them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> must<S>1163</S> first<S>4412</S> be published<S>2784</S> among<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> they shall lead<S>71</S> you, and deliver<S>3860</S> you<S>5209</S> up<S>3860</S>, take<S>4305</S> no<S>3361</S> thought beforehand<S>4305</S> what<S>5101</S> ye shall speak<S>2980</S>, neither<S>3366</S> do ye premeditate<S>3191</S>: but<S>235</S> whatsoever<S>3739</S> shall be<S>1437</S> given<S>1325</S> you<S>5213</S> in<S>1722</S> that<S>1565</S> hour<S>5610</S>, that<S>5124</S> speak<S>2980</S> ye: for<S>1063</S> it is<S>2075</S> not<S>3756</S> ye<S>5210</S> that speak<S>2980</S>, but<S>235</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> the brother<S>80</S> shall betray<S>3860</S> the brother<S>80</S> to<S>1519</S> death<S>2288</S>, and<S>2532</S> the father<S>3962</S> the son<S>5043</S>; and<S>2532</S> children<S>5043</S> shall rise up<S>1881</S> against<S>1909</S> their parents<S>1118</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall cause<S>2289</S> them<S>846</S> to be put to death<S>2289</S>.
And<S>2532</S> ye shall be<S>2071</S> hated<S>3404</S> of<S>5259</S> all<S>3956</S> men for<S>1223</S> my<S>3450</S> name's sake<S>1223</S> <S>3686</S>: but<S>1161</S> he that shall endure<S>5278</S> unto<S>1519</S> the end<S>5056</S>, the same<S>3778</S> shall be saved<S>4982</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> ye shall see<S>1492</S> the abomination<S>946</S> of desolation<S>2050</S>, spoken<S>4483</S> of by<S>5259</S> Daniel<S>1158</S> the prophet<S>4396</S>, standing<S>2476</S> <S>2476</S> where<S>3699</S> it ought<S>1163</S> not<S>3756</S>, (let him that readeth<S>314</S> understand<S>3539</S>,) then<S>5119</S> let them<S>5343</S> that be in<S>1722</S> Judaea<S>2449</S> flee<S>5343</S> to<S>1519</S> the mountains<S>3735</S>:
And<S>1161</S> let him<S>2597</S> that is on<S>1909</S> the housetop<S>1430</S> not<S>3361</S> go down<S>2597</S> into<S>1519</S> the house<S>3614</S>, neither<S>3366</S> enter<S>1525</S> therein, to take<S>142</S> any thing<S>5100</S> out of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3614</S>:
And<S>2532</S> let<S>1994</S> him that is<S>5607</S> in<S>1519</S> the field<S>68</S> not<S>3361</S> turn<S>1519</S> <S>1994</S> back<S>3694</S> again<S>1994</S> for to take up<S>142</S> his<S>846</S> garment<S>2440</S>.
But<S>1161</S> woe<S>3759</S> to them that are<S>2192</S> with<S>1722</S> child<S>1064</S>, and<S>2532</S> to them that give suck<S>2337</S> in<S>1722</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S>!
And<S>1161</S> pray ye<S>4336</S> that<S>3363</S> your<S>5216</S> flight<S>5437</S> be<S>1096</S> not<S>3363</S> in the winter<S>5494</S>.
For<S>1063</S> in those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S> shall be<S>2071</S> affliction<S>2347</S>, such<S>5108</S> as<S>3634</S> was<S>1096</S> not<S>3756</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S> of the creation<S>2937</S> which<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> created<S>2936</S> unto<S>2193</S> this time<S>3568</S>, neither<S>2532</S> <S>3364</S> shall be<S>1096</S>.
And<S>2532</S> except<S>1508</S> that the Lord<S>2962</S> had shortened<S>2856</S> those days<S>2250</S>, no<S>3756</S> <S>3956</S> flesh<S>4561</S> should be<S>302</S> saved<S>4982</S>: but<S>235</S> for<S>1223</S> the elect's sake<S>1588</S>, whom<S>3739</S> he hath chosen<S>1586</S>, he hath shortened<S>2856</S> the days<S>2250</S>.
And<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> if<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> shall say<S>2036</S> to you<S>5213</S>, Lo<S>2400</S>, here<S>5602</S> is Christ<S>5547</S>; or<S>2228</S>, lo<S>2400</S>, he is there<S>1563</S>; believe<S>4100</S> him not<S>3361</S>:
For<S>1063</S> false Christs<S>5580</S> and<S>2532</S> false prophets<S>5578</S> shall rise<S>1453</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall shew<S>1325</S> signs<S>4592</S> and<S>2532</S> wonders<S>5059</S>, to<S>4314</S> seduce<S>635</S>, if<S>1487</S> it were possible<S>1415</S>, even<S>2532</S> the elect<S>1588</S>.
But<S>1161</S> take<S>991</S> ye<S>5210</S> heed<S>991</S>: behold<S>2400</S>, I have foretold<S>4280</S> you<S>5213</S> all things<S>3956</S>.
But<S>235</S> in<S>1722</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S>, after<S>3326</S> that<S>1565</S> tribulation<S>2347</S>, the sun<S>2246</S> shall be darkened<S>4654</S>, and<S>2532</S> the moon<S>4582</S> shall<S>1325</S> not<S>3756</S> give<S>1325</S> her<S>846</S> light<S>5338</S>,
And<S>2532</S> the stars<S>792</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> shall<S>2071</S> fall<S>1601</S>, and<S>2532</S> the powers<S>1411</S> that are in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S> shall be shaken<S>4531</S>.
And<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> shall they see<S>3700</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> coming<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> the clouds<S>3507</S> with<S>3326</S> great<S>4183</S> power<S>1411</S> and<S>2532</S> glory<S>1391</S>.
And<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> shall he send<S>649</S> his<S>846</S> angels<S>32</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall gather together<S>1996</S> his<S>846</S> elect<S>1588</S> from<S>1537</S> the four<S>5064</S> winds<S>417</S>, from<S>575</S> the uttermost part<S>206</S> of the earth<S>1093</S> to<S>2193</S> the uttermost part<S>206</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> learn<S>3129</S> a parable<S>3850</S> of<S>575</S> the fig tree<S>4808</S>; When<S>3752</S> her<S>846</S> branch<S>2798</S> is<S>1096</S> yet<S>2235</S> tender<S>527</S>, and<S>2532</S> putteth forth<S>1631</S> leaves<S>5444</S>, ye know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> summer<S>2330</S> is<S>2076</S> near<S>1451</S>:
So<S>3779</S> ye<S>5210</S> in like manner<S>2532</S>, when<S>3752</S> ye shall see<S>1492</S> these things<S>5023</S> come to pass<S>1096</S>, know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> it is<S>2076</S> nigh<S>1451</S>, even at<S>1909</S> the doors<S>2374</S>.
Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3754</S> this<S>3778</S> generation<S>1074</S> shall<S>3928</S> not<S>3364</S> pass<S>3928</S>, till<S>3360</S> <S>3739</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S> be done<S>1096</S>.
Heaven<S>3772</S> and<S>2532</S> earth<S>1093</S> shall pass away<S>3928</S>: but<S>1161</S> my<S>3450</S> words<S>3056</S> shall<S>3928</S> not<S>3364</S> pass away<S>3928</S>.
But<S>1161</S> of<S>4012</S> that<S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S> and<S>2532</S> that hour<S>5610</S> knoweth<S>1492</S> no man<S>3762</S>, no, not<S>3761</S> the angels<S>32</S> which<S>3588</S> are in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, neither<S>3761</S> the Son<S>5207</S>, but<S>1508</S> the Father<S>3962</S>.
Take ye heed<S>991</S>, watch<S>69</S> and<S>2532</S> pray<S>4336</S>: for<S>1063</S> ye know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> when<S>4219</S> the time<S>2540</S> is<S>2076</S>.
 For the Son of man is as<S>5613</S> a man<S>444</S> taking a far journey<S>590</S>, who left<S>863</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3614</S>, and<S>2532</S> gave<S>1325</S> authority<S>1849</S> to his<S>846</S> servants<S>1401</S>, and<S>2532</S> to every man<S>1538</S> his<S>846</S> work<S>2041</S>, and<S>2532</S> commanded<S>1781</S> the porter<S>2377</S> to<S>2443</S> watch<S>1127</S>.
Watch ye<S>1127</S> therefore<S>3767</S>: for<S>1063</S> ye know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> when<S>4219</S> the master<S>2962</S> of the house<S>3614</S> cometh<S>2064</S>, at even<S>3796</S>, or<S>2228</S> at midnight<S>3317</S>, or<S>2228</S> at the cockcrowing<S>219</S>, or<S>2228</S> in the morning<S>4404</S>:
Lest<S>3361</S> coming<S>2064</S> suddenly<S>1810</S> he find<S>2147</S> you<S>5209</S> sleeping<S>2518</S>.
And<S>1161</S> what<S>3739</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto all<S>3956</S>, Watch<S>1127</S>.
